performance.title: Your Performance Metrics
performance.subtitle: Comprehensive analysis of your academic, quiz, and mock test performance

scale.title: Performance Scale
scale.subtitle: Understand how your metrics compare to benchmarks
scale.excellentDesc: Performance significantly exceeds expectations. Demonstrates mastery of skills and concepts.
scale.goodDesc: Performance exceeds expectations. Shows strong understanding with minor areas for improvement.
scale.averageDesc: Meets expectations. Demonstrates adequate understanding with room for growth.
scale.developingDesc: Approaching expectations. Needs targeted support in key areas.
scale.needsWorkDesc: Below expectations. Requires significant intervention and support.

cta.title: Ready to Analyze Your Performance?
cta.subtitle: Get detailed insights into your strengths and areas for improvement with our comprehensive performance analysis.

academic.description: Your academic performance shows strong results across all subjects with particular strengths in STEM fields.
strengths: Consistent high achiever in Mathematics and Science
recommendations: Consider advanced placement courses in Math and Science
Participate in academic competitions to challenge yourself
Explore research opportunities in your areas of strength

quiz.description: Your performance across all quizzes taken on the platform.
recommendations: Attempt more quizzes in higher levels

mock.description: Your performance in mock tests simulating real exam conditions.

recentAchievements: Published short story in school magazine

section1.title: Our Mission & Vision
section1.paragraph1: To make personalized, world-class education accessible to everyone through AI, helping each learner reach their full potential.
section1.paragraph2: At Novya, we recognize that everyone learns differently and turn each unique style into a strength. Our AI-driven platform makes learning engaging, interactive, and effective, shaping curious, confident, and capable learners ready to achieve their dreams.

section2.paragraph: At Novya, learning is personal and it is built for you, but we know every student learns differently, and we turn your unique way of learning into your greatest strength. Novya's core strength lies in its adaptive learning engine, meticulously designed to understand and respond to your individual needs.
section2.personalizedPaceDesc: Our AI identifies your optimal learning speed, ensuring you're never overwhelmed or bored.
section2.adaptsToStyle: Novya adapts to your preferred learning style, making complex topics intuitive and engaging.
section2.stat1: Of students report feeling more engaged

section3.title: Dive Into Engaging & Adaptive Learning Modules With NOVYA
section3.paragraph: Learning with Novya isn't just about absorbing information, it's about active engagement and deep understanding. Our AI-powered modules are designed to keep you challenged and motivated.

list1.title: Personalized Content :
list1.desc: As you progress, Novya's AI curates your next steps, suggesting relevant topics, advanced challenges, or remedial exercises to ensure a solid foundation.

list2.title: Interactive Simulations :
list2.desc: Experience dynamic lessons filled with interactive quizzes, simulations, and problem-solving scenarios that reinforce learning in a practical way.

list3.title: Real-time Feedback :
list3.desc: Receive instant, actionable feedback that explains why an answer is right or wrong, guiding you toward mastery without frustration.

section4.title: Unlock Your Potential & With NOVYA Resources
section4.paragraph: Novya provides you with more than just courses, we give you the tools and insights to take control of your learning journey and truly unlock your potential.

list1.title: Personalized Progress Reports :
list1.desc: Gain clear, insightful overviews of your performance, highlighting your strengths, areas for improvement, and overall progress.

list2.title: Performance Analytics :
list2.desc: Understand your learning habits and identify patterns that contribute to your success, empowering you to optimize your study strategies.

list4.title: Real-time Feedback :
list4.desc: With data-driven insights, Novya helps you focus your efforts where they matter most, leading to more efficient learning and faster skill acquisition.

section5.title: Data-Driven Insights
section5.paragraph: With Novya, every step of your journey is crafted to spark curiosity, boost confidence, and help you to achieve your true potential.

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.subtitle: Find answers or ask your own question about Novya AI.
faqs.placeholder: e.g. How does the AI doubt solving work?
faqs.userQuestionAnswer: Thanks! Our team will add a detailed answer shortly.

questions.question: What is Novya AI and how does it work?
questions.answer: Novya AI combines video lessons with an AI tutor that helps students clear doubts instantly and track progress effectively.

questions.question: Is this platform suitable for CBSE students?
questions.answer: Yes, we support NCERT and state syllabus from Grade 7 to 10 with subject-wise smart learning tools.

questions.question: Can I use Novya AI on my phone?
questions.answer: Yes! It is fully responsive and works on mobiles, tablets, and desktops with internet access.

questions.question: How do parents track their child's progress?
questions.answer: Parents get their own dashboard to track usage time, quizzes, topics completed, and improvement areas.

questions.question: Do I get a free trial?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial with no payment required upfront.

testimonials.quote1: I improved from 50% to 85% using LMS AI’s personalized feedback system. The AI tutor identified my weak areas instantly!
testimonials.quote2: As a student from a small town, I never had access to quality coaching. LMS AI became my 24/7 mentor at a fraction of the cost!
testimonials.quote3: The progress tracking dashboard helped me monitor my child's improvement week-by-week. Better than any tuition center!
